issue.title: www.goplay.be

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.goplay.be/video/de-mol/de-mol-s11/de-mol-s11-aflevering-1#autoplay](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goplay.be%2Fvideo%2Fde-mol%2Fde-mol-s11%2Fde-mol-s11-aflevering-1%23autoplay) ### Comment Username: @DHN4 > Without adguard the 30 minute ad loads followed by an 5 second ad, then the video play button becomes available. > With adguard, ads do not load but the video does not load either. You get an error message as displayed in the picture, Google DAI stream failed to load ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/tCDO0Ht.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/3yPCNTS.png)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://reports-img.adguard.com/jYjgQNR.png)
Screenshot 4 ![Screenshot 4](https://reports-img.adguard.com/qfTXtER.png)
Screenshot 5 ![Screenshot 5](https://reports-img.adguard.com/BKZnuKf.png)
Screenshot 6 ![Screenshot 6](https://reports-img.adguard.com/hgmhyqZ.png)
Screenshot 7 ![Screenshot 7](https://reports-img.adguard.com/6azBjj1.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.55 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:

comment.body:
Update ticket with results on **Firefox**

**Fun fact:** The ads don't show up on Firefox even without ad-blocker installed
Firefox version: 91.12.0esr (32-bit) 
(Maybe because it's ESR version?)

Run with adguard enabled, no filter enabled:
(**No ads run (??)**; video runs; working)
![FF_SS_W_NoFilter](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/108018397/50b55da3-903e-4335-a22b-e14c45b5c66c)

Run with adguard enabled; Base filter enabled:
(No ads run; video throws error on screen; video does not load; not working)
![FF_SS_NW_BaseFilter](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/108018397/48197000-ab03-4090-94d1-c2e39b0ee613)

Log while running Base filter enabled:
![FF_SS_NW_Log](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/108018397/f22b44ab-98e4-44cc-af6a-05cc8788d7da)

Zipped JSON settings file with only base filter enabled:
[20230513_015946_adg_ext_settings_4.1.55.json.zip](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/files/11468386/20230513_015946_adg_ext_settings_4.1.55.json.zip)

issue.title: www.twitch.tv

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.twitch.tv/tsm_imperialhal](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Ftsm_imperialhal) ### Comment > This is a problem with whole twitch domain, if you watch streams with adguard adblock and streamers ad starts to play i cant see it but video starts buffering, i need to close my adblock watch the ad and then start it again if i want to continue watching ### Screenshots
